details.rust_description:
[Group Limit] Max group size of 3, including sleeping players.
 
          Welcome to Rusty Operations!
 
   Our server brings a premium expierence, offering a mixture of rebalanced
gameplay, premium plugins, and new maps. Suitable ping for US and UK/EU,
265 Server FPS Limit, Active Staff, DDoS Protection, and Dedicated Hardware.
 
          Modifications!
- Building and All Transport Entities Decay Rate Reduced (TC Needed).
- Gather rate is set to 1.5x; sulfur default, pick up resources 2x, Loot(Default).
- Custom Maps including Puzzles & Monuments.
 
          Features & Plugins!        
       Furnace Splitter/Calculator - Clans/Upgraded Teams - Chat Tags
          Build Grade Selector - Private Messages - Killfeed/DeathNotes
Referral Reward - Upgraded Map DeathMarks - Clear Nights - Moveable CCTV
   SAM Auth - Infinite Candles - Draggable Team Corpses - Hijackable CH47
  Double Stack Resources and Charcoal - Code Auto Set - Balanced Economy
   SkinBox - SignArtist - Info Panel - Detailed HUD - Pump Jacks - GUI Shop
       Queue Skip - Advanced Reporting System - No Pay To Win Features
 Fuel Gauge - PilotEject Event - Box With Items Mover - OilRigOpenDoorFix
        Lock On Rockets for Plane Crash Event - HitMarkers - URLCopier
                 ResearchProtection - AutoTeamAuth - Remover Tool
Map Rotations - Customizable Storage Sorter - Holiday Events - Vote Rewards
                 (Each Plugin Has Been Tested on Server and Tweaked)
 
Restarts;         6am(EST) 10am(GMT),    6pm(EST) 10pm(GMT)
